field.filter: SELECT IPSubnet WHERE IF(:this->dhcpv4 = 'yes', org_id = :this->org_id AND finalclass = 'IPv4Subnet', org_id = :this->org_id AND finalclass = "IPv6Subnet")
field.label: Subnet

field.filter: SELECT IPRange WHERE IF(:this->dhcpv4 = 'yes', org_id = :this->org_id AND finalclass = 'IPv4Range', org_id = :this->org_id AND finalclass = "IPv6Range")

dashlet.title: Title:DHCPServers
dashlet.query: SELECT FunctionalCI AS f JOIN lnkFunctionalCIToIPRange AS l ON l.functionalci_id = f.id JOIN IPRange AS ir ON l.iprange_id = ir.id WHERE ir.dhcp = 'dhcp_yes'

menu.oql: SELECT FunctionalCI AS f JOIN lnkFunctionalCIToIPRange AS l ON l.functionalci_id = f.id JOIN IPRange AS ir ON l.iprange_id = ir.id WHERE ir.dhcp = 'dhcp_yes'
